DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Venus Versa Octipolar Applicator Reduction Abdomen Circumference
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-site , prospective , control , randomize , double blind clinical trial . This study design evaluate safety efficacy series treatment use Venus Versa Octipolar applicator . Up 60 healthy subject 10 site shall recruit investigator within investigator 's subject population . Subjects shall abdomen circumference reduce designate treatment area . Each subject undergo 6 treatment interval one treatment per week sex consecutive week . There one month follow occur 4 week 6th treatment . At first treatment visit , investigator collect demographic medical information randomization take place . Subjects equal opportunity select treatment control group . The duration treatment session approximately 60 minute . Expected immediate response include temporary mild moderate erythema and/or edema . Skin safety assessment conduct investigator treatment session follow-up visit . Photography conduct baseline , begin 4th & 6th treatment 1 month follow visit . Subjects ask complete questionnaire treatment one month follow visit . Circumference measurement conduct base line , treatment follow visit . The treatment consider successful treated area circumference , reduces least 2.5 cm .
